2. Cerebral vasospasm: This is a disease that refers to the narrowing of blood vessels in the brain, which can lead to reduced blood flow and oxygen supply to brain tissues.
3. Acute lymphoblastic leukemia: This is a type of cancer that affects the blood and bone marrow, leading to the production of abnormal white blood cells that can crowd out healthy cells and make it difficult for the body to fight infections.
